name: FaeVerse Alchemy
detailed_description:
FaeVerse Alchemy is an engaging and challenging puzzle game where you combine three or more of one kind of element to form a single piece of a higher quality element. ♦

• Pure Mode - Item drops are not possible, pure alchemy gameplay. Play this mode first!
• Chaos Mode - Anything can happen! Inventory begins randomize, all items can drop. It's true chaos!
• Infinity Mode - Overflows never cause game over.
• Puzzle Mode - Solve puzzles! We will be new adding puzzle packs involving the many special items over time!
• Chronos Mode - Push your luck in a time based mode to see how high your score can get before time runs out!
• Abyss Mode - Daily Challenge Mode! Play once per day for a high score. Everyone in the world has the same game possible. Will you get the high score?

IMPORTANT - HOW TO PLAY : The basic rules are simple. Combine like elements together to form higher quality elements. In Chaos Mode, there are many items that can cause special interactions. Once you’ve used an item on the board, you can view what items may do by pressing the ? button at the top right. We recommend playing Pure mode for your first time playing. ♦

On screen buttons, and touch screen style controls are supported along with various other game options. ♦

This game is updated by the developers over time. We still have many features and content that we plan to add to the game. Updates will be added to this version when they are ready. If you have feedback you are welcome to contact us. ♦

We want to make this game better for you! If you like games like this, but there are some details about it that you think would make it better, please contact us with your suggestions. ♦

If you have any questions at all please ask us! We are happy to answer any questions you have. ♦
